body.p: 1. Ancestor of King David (Ru 4:19; 1 Chr 2:9-10), listed in Matthew’s genealogy of Christ (Mt 1:3-4; called Arni in Lk 3:33). See Genealogy of Jesus Christ.
2. Jerahmeel’s eldest son (1 Chr 2:25-27), and perhaps the nephew of #1 above.
3. Head of the family of Elihu, one of Job’s friends (Jb 32:2).
